text: The family has been making and sharing Christmas cards since the late'80s, and with each and every year we're presented with a new side of the family - with the only major running theme being that things get more and more glam as each Christmas comes around. The Kardashian family has never done anything half - arsed. Whether it's selfies, massive beauty empires or sex tapes, they really do go all in. And one Kardashian commitment that we are so, so glad they have stuck to is their lavish annual Christmas card. With Christmas fast approaching, we are all ready and waiting for the family to drop this year's card. Rumours have already been circling as to who will be in it will Scott be cut out again? Will Tristan be in it? ),
